text:
Может будет кому-то из интересующихся биоинформатикой полезно:
> Two very big pieces of news from me today.
> First, Pavel Pevzner and I are making our textbook, _Bioinformatics Algorithms: An Active Learning Approach,_ available to read for free on our textbook website. You can find the first two chapters on a completely redesigned website at <http://bioinformaticsalgorithms.org>. We will be releasing more chapters in the coming weeks.
> Second, we now have a standalone interactive version of our book that you can complete on Stepik. You can complete automatically-graded coding challenges and exercises in the browser, and get a certificate of completion when you are done! Check it out today at <https://stepik.org/course/55789/promo>.
> Finally, if you're on Twitter, please help me get the word out about our effort to make our work open to all: <https://twitter.com/PhillipCompeau/status/1230159605331877888>.
> All the Best,
> Phillip Compeau

attachments.title: Bioinformatics Algorithms: A Free Online Textbook
attachments.text: Read our free best-selling textbook, Bioinformatics Algorithms. Learn from our lecture videos, and explore our popular online courses.
attachments.fallback: Test: Bioinformatics Algorithms: A Free Online Textbook

attachments.title: Bioinformatics Algorithms: An Active Learning Approach
attachments.text: Journey to the Frontier of Computational Biology. Master bioinformatics software and computational approaches in modern biology.
attachments.fallback: Stepik: online education: Bioinformatics Algorithms: An Active Learning Approach

<https://twitter.com/PhillipCompeau|@PhillipCompeau>: :mega::mega::mega:I'm so happy to announce that our textbook website for Bioinformatics Algorithms has re-launched!

Some big news: we are making our textbook totally FREE -- two chapters live today and more to come.

Lecture videos + links to online courses too!

<http://bioinformaticsalgorithms.org/home>
attachments.text:

Two very big pieces of news from me today.
First, Pavel Pevzner and I are making our textbook,
Bioinformatics Algorithms: An Active Learning Approach,
available to read for free on our textbook website. You can find the first two chapters on a completely redesigned website at

. We will be releasing more chapters in the coming weeks.
Second, we now have a standalone interactive version of our book that you can complete on Stepik. You can complete automatically-graded coding challenges and exercises in the browser, and get a certificate of completion when you are done! Check it out today at

.
Finally, if you're on Twitter, please help me get the word out about our effort to make our work open to all:

.
All the Best,
Phillip Compeau

text: Добрый день. Недавно тут. Начал готовиться к экзаменам ШАД. И ищу людей, которые тоже готовятся и собираются поступить. Полезно готовиться в группе людей, чем одному. Уровень решения задач текущий не очень высокий(открыл 2 случайных варианта и смог придумать по 3 задачи в  каждом из них). Если есть люди готовые вместе решать, обсуждать и учиться, то можем организовать чатик и решать вместе
